name: Pokémon Stadium Kaizo
overview:
The first Hard Mode Hack of Pokémon Stadium.

The good news is that the rental Pokémon have been buffed; they have better movesets and stats, and the prevolutions of most Pokemon have been replaced by final stage evolutions with different movesets.

All 151 Pokémon can be recorded in Hall of Fame from Rental Pokémon alone. You’ll need to reach Round 2 in order to achieve this. Only certain cups have certain Pokémon provided, so you have to visit many of them. You can still use continues in the Stadium Cups, but you cannot do so in Gym Leader Castle.

Enemies are significantly stronger. They have better AI, Pokemon teams, movesets, stats. Round 2 also has some surprises on your way.

Note: If you are using Project 64, you will need to include the new CRC values in the RDB file, since this is a recent Pokémon Stadium hack.
